[`AbstractInputSuggest`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/AbstractInputSuggest.md)

## AbstractInputSuggest class

Attach to an `<input>` element or a `<div contentEditable>` to add type-ahead support.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export abstract class AbstractInputSuggest<T> extends PopoverSuggest<T> 
```
**Extends:** [`PopoverSuggest`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/PopoverSuggest.md)`<T>`

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [`(constructor)(app, textInputEl)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/AbstractInputSuggest/(constructor).md) |  | Accepts an <code>&lt;input&gt;</code> text box or a contenteditable div. |

|  [`limit`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/AbstractInputSuggest/limit.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Limit to the number of elements rendered at once. Set to 0 to disable. Defaults to 100. |
